DOC.brief_summary: The mission project develop novel system care provide efficacious , scalable , cost-effective , participant friendly behavioral intervention technology ( BITs ) prevention depression adolescent . The investigator define BITs intervention use information telecommunication technology internet , mobile traditional phone , computer and/or technology support deliver psychological behavioral intervention . Through usability testing , focus interview , field trial , investigator may modify technology intervention base immediate usage data .
DOC.brief_title: Technology Assisted Programs That Promote Mental Health Teenagers
DOC.detailed_description: The mission project develop novel system care provide efficacious , scalable , cost-effective , participant friendly behavioral intervention technology ( BITs ) prevention depression adolescent . The investigator define BITs intervention use information telecommunication technology internet , mobile traditional phone , computer and/or technology support deliver psychological behavioral intervention . Through usability testing , focus interview , field trial , investigator may modify technology intervention base immediate usage data .
DOC.criteria: Has score 1239 ( male ) / 1539 ( female ) Center Epidemiologic Studies Depression Scale ( CESD ) OR report past month use marijuana , cigarette , alcohol substance Center Disease Control Youth Risk Behavior Survey ( YRBS ) . Is familiar use computer Internet , well mobile phone Is able speak read English Is 1419 year age Is currently take antidepressant medication take one previous 3 month Has visual , hearing , voice , motor impairment would prevent completion study procedure use Internet mobile phone Is diagnose psychotic disorder , bipolar disorder , dissociative disorder , current substance dependence , diagnosis participation trial either inappropriate dangerous . Inclusion participant symptoms anxiety disorder , eat disorder substance abuse disorder make casebycase basis . Is severely suicidal ( ideation , plan , intent past 12 month ) .
